WorkItem.Description:
Unicode in strings are convert to "????" after the inline minification is processed.

   <title>✄信息✈</title>
   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />

   <script type="text/javascript">
      alert('✄信息✈');
      alert('test');
   </script>

</head>

                becomes:

WorkItem.Summary: Unicode not converted in inline minified script for .aspx

Comments.Message: Same here. Please add “--charset utf-8” option support for YUI.
